resources: The solution to the economic problem of deciding which goods to produce requires: Opportunity cost is always: "Which of the following statements explains how price, demand and supply respond to a surplus?" Which of the following could most effectively explain this situation?" If they both maximise utility then the marginal utility from each good consumed will be:" Vertical product differentiation refers to differences between products which reflect: Which of the following reveals constant returns to scale?
